tag_list: moonslipper, holistic, paranormal, feng-shui, energy, geopathic-stress
overview:
Siobhan Smith is the owner of www.moonslipper.com, a website and company that helps people create a harmonious, healthy and peaceful home and work environment.

Siobhan has a psychic and mediumistic background and through helping people with their paranormal problems, she found a correlation between leylines, geopathic stress and paranormal activity. Siobhan also found that there are many other elements that contribute to a happy, holistic home such as Feng Shui and Energy Clearing.

Moonslipper.com has a client base that stretches from the US to Asia. The work is done by distance, ensuring the confidentiality and privacy of their clients.
